column5: Where is a good place to buy Reefrunners in Canada?
What part of Canada are you in? There are quite a few outlets in the West selling them. You can e-mail me for more info.Russ
Thanks Russ,I live in the Saskatoon area.

The following is a list of people carrying Reef Runners here in the west:Pokey's Tackle , ReginaThe Travelling Tackle Box, Stettler, Ab.Tackle Corner, Medicine Hat Ab,Russell Sports, Calgary on line at http://www.russellsports.comWholesale sports,Calgary and maybe Saskatoon I know they have them in the mail order catalog too.I hope this helps, Reef Runner will soon be offering on line direct too.Good Fishin'Russ
